subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A forward, and reverse voice.

full_text:

Well,
  She's not very nice, is she?  

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
              
  I�m workin� on it, but the idiots from Grass harp don�t make it any easier!
  
  
  
   �(YAWN)
  Your quote is verty fitting for you. It certainly describes you well. 
  No one is debunking. No one but 3 people are even responding to your fake recordings and the majority pay no attention to you.  You are a lonely man who is obsessed with getting attention. With no life except for sitting in your basement and at work begging the world for attention with your same old posts and photos of toys. Nothing changes. No real predictions. Empty handed as usual and trying to convisce people you are recording voices when you have yet to submit any real evp samples. I bet you couldn't get raw evp which is why you rely on static radio voices that can be imagined to say anything. I see from your posts you are married to a fearful woman you can't discuss this with and throw a tantrum when anyone can't hear what you do. The spirit world continues to play with you Frank and you swallow the bait hook, line, and sinker. You are a perfect target for low levels. Lonely, angry, and negative. I thought you were going to do me a favor and not write again?
  
  Alice�
